title: Demi Moore's new memoir Inside Out reaches the No. 1 spot on the New York Times Best Sellers list
text:
She's been lauded for her strength, her candor and her sobriety after the release of her new memoir Inside Out.

And now, Demi Moore, 56, is taking time to celebrate herself and her achievements.

The Ghost star took to Instagram Thursday to celebrate her just published book reaching the top of The New York Times Best Sellers list.

Celebrate! Demi Moore, 56, took to Instagram Thursday to celebrate her just published book reaching the top of The New York Times Best Sellers list

'Got my cover all dressed up to tell you the big news... #InsideOutBook just hit #1 on @nytimes bestseller list!' she announced in the post's caption.

'This is all so much more than I could have expected and I am so overwhelmed by the support and love you’ve given it. Thank you guys for reading and allowing it to resonate with you xx,' Moore wrote.

In the first photo in the series, the G.I. Jane star can be seen smiling while holding a copy of the novel.

The second photo is a screenshot of the list, with Inside Out at the top spot in the nonfiction category.

Top of the charts! The second photo is a screenshot of the list, with Inside Out at the top spot in the nonfiction category

In the book, the Striptease actress details her marriages and divorces along with raising the three daughters she shares with Bruce Willis as well as her battle with drug and alcohol addiction.

She also talks about growing up in New Mexico as the daughter of a mother who had her own struggles with addiction and a dad who wasn't her biological father.

In the candid tell-all, the star recounts how she was raped at just 15 years old by an older man who had given her alcoholic mother $500.

First husband: Moore married rock musician Freddy Moore, now age 69, just two years later, and kept his name following their divorce after five years of marriage (pictured in 1982)

She married rock musician Freddy Moore, now age 69, just two years later, and kept his name following their divorce after five years of marriage.

Moore went on to marry Bruce Willis, 64, after a whirlwind four-month romance, but, she reveals, he wanted her to give up her burgeoning Hollywood career and stay at home to raise their children.

After her divorce from Willis, she started dating Ashton Kutcher, 41, who is 15 years her junior.

Blended family: After her divorce from Bruce Willis, 64, she started dating Ashton Kutcher, 41, who is 15 years her junior (pictured in Hollywood with kids Rumour (L), Scout (C) and Tallulah Belle (R) in 2003)

She describes how she became pregnant with Kutcher's baby but miscarried at six months.

They went on to tie the knot in 2005 when she was 42 and he was 27, but during the marriage she relapsed and started drinking and abusing drugs again.

Moore also said they took part in threesomes and accused Ashton of cheating on her.

Dropping bombs: Demi's other revelations include her estrangement from her daughters following a near fatal overdose in 2012 and her obsession with dieting and working out in her 20's and 30's

Her other revelations include her estrangement from her daughters following a near fatal overdose in 2012 and her obsession with dieting and working out in her 20's and 30's.

Her daughter, Rumer Willis, 31, recently spoke about her mother's strength and candor in the book.

'I’m so proud of her vulnerability,' the actress, who was a co-host on The Talk on Tuesday, said of Moore's book.

The Kentucky-born daughter of Demi and Bruce Willis said her mom has been a 'beacon of strength' for women over her decades in Hollywood.
